review: Met mrs. Sruthi for my reduced Saliva secretion which is identified as stress induced related to sjogrens syndrome. Mrs. Sruthi was really friendly and i whatsapp her whenever I have doubts . She replies even during mid nights in her busy schedules. Her treatment was very rapid for me and slowly it started with my recovery and now I am completely recovered. Her timely help and selflessness was whole thing that helped me overcome my diagnosis. I definitely would recommend her for oral and other health issues

With utmost appreciation, I would like to express my heartfelt thanks to Dr.Shruthi Murali for the exceptional treatment I received for my lockjaw. Your professionalism, meticulousness, and kind demeanor made the entire process much more manageable. Thank you for ensuring my long-term well-being

A very humble, kind, and passionate doctor, with unbelievable clinical expertise. I witnessed some general physicians seeking her opinion in diagnosing immune disorders. She takes a detailed history and minimizes the use of Xrays or other modalities to zero in on the correct diagnosis. She ensures that the patient is well-informed of his/her condition and also follows up on her own with personal interest and no extra charge.
Good Pal Doctor. Has been very friendly while consulting. Recommendation 10/10. Avoids recommending more tablets.

Contacted Dr.Sruti Murali for oral ulcer. She patiently heard the whole medical history and prescribed medicines for 3 days. I was relieved of pain on the 2nd day itself. She has a pleasing approach and explains the condition in a simple language which is appreciable.

I took my friend for broken tooth....he was very quickly diagonised and given treatment. This doctor never goes for unnecessary tests. Treats patients well. Her patient hearing and approaches makes patients recover soon.
She really understands the issue well by asking right questions and gives a proper solution. Would definitely recommend her.
